name: Risk
description: A Risk is a potential problem that could affect the project. Risks are identified and assessed in the Risk Management process.

attributes.name: Probability
attributes.description: The probability of the risk occurring in percent (low, medium, high).

attributes.name: Impact
attributes.description: The impact of the risk occurring (low, medium, high).

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: The status of the risk (new, mitigated, archived).
